name: .CHATALL
summary: Learn about .CHATALL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a CHATALL file with ChatALL (cross-platform). For example, to open a CHATALL file with the Windows version of ChatALL, click the gear icon in the upper-right corner, select Chats, and then click Import Data.

Since CHATALL files are Zip-compressed archives, you can also view the contents of a CHATALL file by unzipping the file with a decompression tool, such as Microsoft File Explorer (bundled with Windows), Corel WinZip (Windows), or Apple Archive Utility (bundled with macOS). You may need to rename the .chatall file extension to .zip for the Zip utility to recognize and decompress it.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .chatall file in ChatALL 1
images.caption: CHATALL file open in ChatALL 1
